roleset.name: Observe with attention.

example.name: Arg0 only
example.text: A woman in a red shirt standing in an open courtyard doing an exercise with a man in a white shirt and pants onlooking .

propbank.arg: a man in a white shirt and pants

example.name: Both args
example.text: Dr. Doojin Vak with safety glasses onlooking at the machine that prints flexible solar panels .

propbank.arg: Dr. Doojin Vak with safety glasses
at the machine that prints flexible solar panels

roleset.note: Use only if the rel is inseperable. Do not use for 'on look' or 'look on', which should be look.01, where the real is not the single word 'onlook'. Based on look.01, added for Flickr. )
